ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and when you attack, attack as tyrants do?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And whenever you apply force become tyrannical.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and when you strike you strike like tyrants?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When you attack, you attack as tyrants do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And when you apprehend someone, you seize him mercilessly?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when you seize (somebody), seize you (him) as tyrants"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when you lay hands (on men) you lay hands (like) tyrants;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: When you assault, you assault like tyrants!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And if ye seize by force, seize ye as tyrants?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When you lay hands upon anyone, you do so as tyrants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when ye seize, ye seize like unto tyrants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and when you seize [someone for punishment], you seize [him] like tyrants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And when ye exert your strong hand, do ye do it like men of absolute power?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when you seize, seize you as tyrants?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When you assault, you assault like tyrants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And when you strike, you strike mercilessly?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when you strike, you strike as tyrants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:130] And when you assault, to smite or slay, you assault like tyrants, mercilessly!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And if ye seize by force, seize ye as tyrants?) And when you punish, you do so in the manner of the tyrants: you beat up and kill in a state of anger.
